name: generic-webdriver-server
description: A generic WebDriver server base class and a Selenium add-on to invoke it.
author: Google

scripts.jar: ant -f java/build.xml jar && cp java/build/jar/*.jar java/third_party/selenium*.jar ./
scripts.checkClean: [[ -z "$(git status --short .)" ]] || (echo "Git not clean!"; git status .; exit 1)
scripts.prepack: npm run lint && npm run checkClean && npm run jar
